00001 /*
00002 ###############################################################################
00003 #
00004 #  EGSnrc egs++ voxelized human phantom geometry
00005 #  Copyright (C) 2015 National Research Council Canada
00006 #
00007 #  This file is part of EGSnrc.
00008 #
00009 #  EGSnrc is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under
00010 #  the terms of the GNU Affero General Public License as published by the
00011 #  Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your
00012 #  option) any later version.
00013 #
00014 #  EGSnrc is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY
00015 #  WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS
00016 #  FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the GNU Affero General Public License for
00017 #  more details.
00018 #
00019 #  You should have received a copy of the GNU Affero General Public License
00020 #  along with EGSnrc. If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
00021 #
00022 ###############################################################################
00023 #
00024 #  Author:          Iwan Kawrakow, 2008
00025 #
00026 #  Contributors:    Frederic Tessier
00027 #
00028 ###############################################################################
00029 #
00030 #  A "Voxelized Human Phantom" (VHP) geometry.
00031 #
00032 #  Although a VHP geometry is just a XYZ geometry, due to the huge number of
00033 #  voxels one has to be more careful with memory use for media indices, etc.
00034 #  That's why this separate geometry implementation. With Richard Kramer's
00035 #  phantom data the implementation requires ~12 MB to hold all the organ data
00036 #  in memory. Richard's ASCII phantom data was also transformed into binary
00037 #  format with the result that loading them is almost instantaneous.
00038 #
00039 #  For now the implementation only provides the macro geometry, i.e., no
00040 #  spongiosa micro matrices. Adding the micro matrices is the next step.
00041 #
00042 ###############################################################################
00043 */
00044 
00045

00069 EGS_VoxelInfo* EGS_VoxelGeometry::v = 0;
00070 int            EGS_VoxelGeometry::nv = 0;

00072 VHP_OrganData::VHP_OrganData(const char *fname, int slice_min, int slice_max)
00073     : nslice(0), ok(false) {
00074     ifstream data(fname,ios::binary);
00075     if( !data ) {
00076         egsWarning("VHP_OrganData: failed to open file %s for reading\n",
00077                 fname); return;
00078     }
00079     char endian; data.read(&endian,sizeof(endian));
00080     char my_endian = egsGetEndian();
00081     if( endian != my_endian ) {
00082         egsWarning("VHP_OrganData: wrong endianess. \n"
00083             "This machine has endianess %d, data was written on %d\n"
00084             "This requires byte swaping, which has not been implemented yet\n",
00085             (int)my_endian,(int)endian); return;
00086     }
00087     data.read((char *)&dx, sizeof(dx));
00088     data.read((char *)&dy, sizeof(dy));
00089     data.read((char *)&dz, sizeof(dz));
00090     data.read((char*)&nslice,sizeof(nslice));
00091     if( slice_min < 0 ) slice_min = 0;
00092     if( slice_max > nslice ) slice_max = nslice;
00093     int nwant = slice_max - slice_min;
00094     slices = new VHP_SliceInfo [nwant];
00095     nx = 0, ny = 0; int is = 0;
00096     for(int islice=0; islice<nslice; ++islice) {
00097         if( islice >= slice_min ) {
00098             slices[is].readData(data);
00099             int ni, nj; slices[is++].getSliceDimensions(ni,nj);
00100             if( ni > nx ) nx = ni;
00101             if( nj > ny ) ny = nj;
00102         }
00103         else {
00104             VHP_SliceInfo tmp; tmp.readData(data);
00105         }
00106         if( islice == slice_max - 1 ) break;
00107     }
00108     nxy = nx*ny; nslice = slice_max - slice_min;
00109     if( data.fail() )
00110         egsWarning("VHP_OrganData: I/O error while reading data\n");
00111     else ok = true;
00112 }
00113 
00114 VHP_OrganData::~VHP_OrganData() { if( nslice ) delete [] slices; }
00115 
00116 void VHP_RowInfo::readData(istream &in) {
00117     unsigned short n;
00118     in.read((char *)&n,sizeof(n));
00119     if( n != nbin ) {
00120         if( nbin > 0 ) { delete [] pix; delete [] org; nbin = 0; }
00121     }
00122     if( n < 1 ) return;
00123     if( !nbin ) {
00124         nbin = n; pix = new unsigned short [nbin+1];
00125         org = new unsigned char [nbin];
00126     }
00127     in.read((char *)pix,(nbin+1)*sizeof(unsigned short));
00128     in.read((char *)org,nbin*sizeof(unsigned char));
00129 }
00130 
00131 void VHP_SliceInfo::readData(istream &in) {
00132     if( rinfo ) { delete [] rinfo; rinfo = 0; }
00133     in.read((char *)&firstr,sizeof(firstr));
00134     in.read((char *)&lastr,sizeof(lastr));
00135     int nrow = lastr-firstr+1;
00136     if( nrow > 0 ) {
00137         rinfo = new VHP_RowInfo [nrow];
00138         for(int j=0; j<nrow; ++j) rinfo[j].readData(in);
00139     }
00140 }
00141 #endif

00143 EGS_VHPGeometry::EGS_VHPGeometry(const char *phantom_file,
00144         const char *media_file, int slice_min, int slice_max,
00145         const string &Name) :
00146     EGS_BaseGeometry(Name), vg(0), micros(0), nmicro(0) {
00147     organs = new VHP_OrganData(phantom_file,slice_min,slice_max);
00148     if( !organs->isOK() ) {
00149         egsWarning("EGS_VHPGeometry: failed to construct organ data\n");
00150         delete organs; organs = 0; return;
00151     }
00152     ifstream med_data(media_file);
00153     if( !med_data ) {
00154         egsWarning("EGS_VHPGeometry: failed to open media data file %s\n",
00155              media_file);
00156         delete organs; organs = 0; return;
00157     }
00158     int norg; med_data >> norg;
00159     if( norg < 1 ) {
00160         egsWarning("EGS_VHPGeometry: %d organs in media data file %s?\n",
00161                 norg,media_file);
00162         delete organs; organs = 0; return;
00163     }
00164     int j;
00165     for(j=0; j<256; ++j) {
00166         organ_media[j] = -1; organ_names[j] = "Undefined";
00167         organ_micro[j] = -1;
00168     }
00169     char buf[1024]; med_data.getline(buf,1023);
00170     for(j=0; j<norg; ++j) {
00171         int iorg, imed; char c; med_data >> iorg >> imed >> c;
00172         med_data.getline(buf,1023);
00173         if( iorg < 0 || iorg > 255 )
00174             egsWarning("EGS_VHPGeometry: bad organ number %d on line %d\n",
00175                     iorg,j+2);
00176         else organ_media[iorg] = imed;
00177         organ_names[iorg] = c; organ_names[iorg] += buf;
00178     }
00179     int nmed; med_data >> nmed; med_data.getline(buf,1023);
00180     vector<string> media_names;
00181     vector<int> media_indeces;
00182     for(j=0; j<nmed; ++j) {
00183         med_data.getline(buf,1023); string med(buf);
00184         media_names.push_back(med);
00185         media_indeces.push_back(EGS_BaseGeometry::addMedium(med));
00186     }
00187     egsInformation("EGS_VHPGeometry: media information\n");
00188     for(j=0; j<nmed; ++j) {
00189         egsInformation("Medium %s registered as medium number %d\n",
00190                 media_names[j].c_str(),media_indeces[j]);
00191     }
00192     for(j=0; j<256; ++j) {
00193         if( organ_media[j] >= 0 ) {
00194             if( organ_media[j] >= nmed ) {
00195                 egsWarning("EGS_VHPGeometry: invalid medium index %d\n",
00196                         organ_media[j]);
00197             }
00198             else organ_media[j] = media_indeces[organ_media[j]];
00199         }
00200     }
00201     EGS_Float dx, dy, dz; int nx, ny, nz;
00202     organs->getVoxelSizes(dx,dy,dz); organs->getPhantomDimensions(nx,ny,nz);
00203     vg = new EGS_VoxelGeometry(nx,ny,nz,dx,dy,dz);
00204     nreg = nx*ny*nz; nmacro = nreg;
00205     egsInformation("Phantom size in voxels: x=%d y=%d z=%d\n",nx,ny,nz);
00206     egsInformation("Voxel sizes: dx=%g dy=%g dz=%g\n",dx,dy,dz);
00207 }
00208 
00209 void EGS_VHPGeometry::setMicros(EGS_Input *input) {
00210     if( !vg || !organs ) {
00211         egsWarning("EGS_VHPGeometry::setMicros: called for an invalid "
00212                 "VHP geometry\n"); return;
00213     }
00214     if( !input->getInputItem("micro matrix") ) {
00215         egsWarning("EGS_VHPGeometry::setMicros: no micro matrix definitions\n");
00216         return;
00217     }
00218     vector<EGS_MicroMatrixCluster *> mv;
00219     string dir; input->getInput("micro matrix folder",dir);
00220     EGS_Float t_bsc; bool ok = true;
00221     const static char *err_msg =
00222         "EGS_VHPGeometry::setMicros: wrong/missing '%s' input\n";
00223     int err = input->getInput("BSC thickness",t_bsc);
00224     if( err || t_bsc < 0 ) {
00225         egsWarning(err_msg,"BSC thickness"); ok = false;
00226     }
00227     string tb_medium, bm_medium;
00228     err = input->getInput("TB medium",tb_medium);
00229     if( err ) {
00230         egsWarning(err_msg,"TB medium"); ok = false;
00231     }
00232     err = input->getInput("BM medium",bm_medium);
00233     if( err ) {
00234         egsWarning(err_msg,"BM medium"); ok = false;
00235     }
00236     if( !ok ) {
00237         egsWarning("EGS_VHPGeometry::setMicros: wrong/missing inputs found\n"
00238              "  => no micro matrices set for use\n");
00239         return;
00240     }
00241     int tb_med = addMedium(tb_medium), bm_med = addMedium(bm_medium);
00242     vector<string> minput;
00243     while( !input->getInput("micro matrix",minput) ) {
00244         delete input->takeInputItem("micro matrix");
00245         if( minput.size() < 2 ) {
00246             egsWarning("EGS_VHPGeometry::setMicros: 'micro matrix' input"
00247                  " requires at least two inputs => ignored\n");
00248             continue;
00249         }
00250         string fname = dir.size() ? egsJoinPath(dir,minput[0]) : minput[0];
00251         EGS_MicroMatrixCluster *mcluster = new EGS_MicroMatrixCluster(
00252                 vg->dx,vg->dy,vg->dz,t_bsc,tb_med,bm_med,fname.c_str());
00253         if( !mcluster->isValid() ) {
00254             egsWarning("failed to construct micro cluster from %s\n",
00255                     fname.c_str()); delete mcluster;
00256         }
00257         else {
00258             bool ok = true; vector<int> orgs;
00259             for(int i=1; i<minput.size(); ++i) {
00260                 S_STREAM s(minput[i].c_str()); int org; s >> org;
00261                 if( s.fail() ) {
00262                     egsWarning("EGS_VHPGeometry::setMicros: invalid input %s "
00263                           "for micro matrix %s\n",minput[i].c_str(),
00264                           minput[0].c_str()); ok = false;
00265                 }
00266                 else {
00267                     if( org < 0 || org > 255 ) {
00268                         egsWarning("EGS_VHPGeometry::setMicros: invalid input"
00269                           " %d for micro matrix %s\n",org,minput[0].c_str());
00270                         ok = false;
00271                     }
00272                     else orgs.push_back(org);
00273                 }
00274             }
00275             if( ok ) {
00276                 mv.push_back(mcluster);
00277                 egsInformation("Using micro matrix data from\n    %s\nfor"
00278                      " organs:",fname.c_str());
00279                 for(int i=0; i<orgs.size(); ++i) {
00280                     egsInformation(" %d",orgs[i]);
00281                     organ_micro[orgs[i]] = mv.size()-1;
00282                 }
00283                 egsInformation("\n");
00284             }
00285             else delete mcluster;
00286         }
00287     }
00288     if( mv.size() > 0 ) {
00289         if( nmicro > 0 ) {
00290             for(int i=0; i<nmicro; ++i) delete micros[i];
00291             delete [] micros;
00292         }
00293         nmicro = mv.size();
00294         micros = new EGS_MicroMatrixCluster* [nmicro];
00295         nmax = 0;
00296         for(int i=0; i<nmicro; ++i) {
00297             micros[i] = mv[i];
00298             int nr = micros[i]->nxy*micros[i]->nz;
00299             int nm = micros[i]->mxy*micros[i]->mz;
00300             if( nm*nr > nmax ) nmax = nm*nr;
00301         }
00302         nmacro = vg->nxy*vg->nz;
00303         EGS_I64 ntot = nmax; ntot *= nmicro; ntot += nmacro;
00304         if( ntot > 2147483647 ) egsFatal("EGS_VHPGeometry::setMicros: "
00305             "too many micro regions\n");
00306         nreg = nmacro + nmax*nmicro;
00307         egsInformation("Using regions 0...%d to identify macro voxels\n",
00308                 nmacro-1);
00309         egsInformation("Using regions %d...%d to identify micro voxels\n",
00310                 nmacro,nreg-1);
00311     }
00312 }
00313 
00314 EGS_VHPGeometry::~EGS_VHPGeometry() {
00315     if( organs ) delete organs;
00316     if( vg ) delete vg;
00317     if( nmicro > 0 ) {
00318         for(int j=0; j<nmicro; ++j) delete micros[j];
00319         delete [] micros;
00320     }
00321 
00322 }

00324 void EGS_VHPGeometry::setMedia(EGS_Input *,int,const int *) {
00325     egsWarning("EGS_VHPGeometry::setMedia: don't use this method.\n"
00326         " Media are fixed by the organ data defining an VHP geometry\n");
00327 }

00329 void EGS_VHPGeometry::printInfo() const {
00330     EGS_BaseGeometry::printInfo();
00331     if( isOK() ) {
00332         egsInformation("  voxel sizes: %g %g %g\n",vg->dx,vg->dy,vg->dz);
00333         egsInformation("  phantom size: %d %d %d\n",vg->nx,vg->ny,vg->nz);
00334     }
00335     else egsInformation("  undefined VHP geometry\n");
00336 }
00337 
00338 string EGS_VHPGeometry::type = "EGS_VHPGeometry";
00339 
00340 #ifndef SKIP_DOXYGEN
00341 VHPBox EGS_MicroMatrixCluster::bm_boxes[64];
00342 bool   EGS_MicroMatrixCluster::bm_boxes_initialized = false;
00343 
00344 EGS_MicroMatrixCluster::EGS_MicroMatrixCluster(
00345         EGS_Float Dx, EGS_Float Dy, EGS_Float Dz, EGS_Float bsc_thickness,
00346         int tb_med, int bm_med, const char *micro_file) : micros(0), vg(0),
00347         med_tb(tb_med), med_bm(bm_med) {
00348     //
00349     // *** open micro-matrix file
00350     //
00351     ifstream in(micro_file,ios::binary);
00352     if( !in ) {
00353         egsWarning("EGS_MicroMatrixCluster: failed to open file %s\n",
00354                 micro_file); return;
00355     }
00356 
00357     //
00358     // *** read data
00359     //
00360     unsigned char Mx, My, Mz;
00361     in.read((char *)&Mx,sizeof(Mx));
00362     in.read((char *)&My,sizeof(My));
00363     in.read((char *)&Mz,sizeof(Mz));
00364     mx = Mx; my = My; mz = Mz;
00365     mxy = mx*my; nmic = mxy*mz;
00366     micros = new unsigned char* [nmic];
00367     in.read((char *)&Mx,sizeof(Mx));
00368     in.read((char *)&My,sizeof(My));
00369     in.read((char *)&Mz,sizeof(Mz));
00370     nx = Mx; ny = My; nz = Mz; nxy = nx*ny; int nxyz = nxy*nz, j; nreg = nxyz;
00371     {for(int j=0; j<nmic; ++j) {
00372         micros[j] = new unsigned char [nxyz];
00373         in.read((char *)micros[j],nxyz*sizeof(unsigned char));
00374         if( in.fail() ) {
00375             egsWarning("EGS_MicroMatrixCluster: I/O error while reading "
00376                "%d'th micto-matrix from file %s\n",j+1,micro_file);
00377             for(int i=0; i<=j; ++i) delete [] micros[j];
00378             delete [] micros; micros = 0; return;
00379         }
00380     }}
00381 
00382     //
00383     // *** initialize micro- and macro-voxel sizes and numbers
00384     //
00385     dx = Dx; dy = Dy; dz = Dz;
00386     dxi = 1/dx; dyi = 1/dy; dzi = 1/dz;
00387     EGS_Float ddx = Dx/nx, ddy = Dy/ny, ddz = Dz/nz;
00388     egsInformation("Macro voxel sizes: %g %g %g\n",dx,dy,dz);
00389     egsInformation("Micro voxel sizes: %g %g %g\n",ddx,ddy,ddz);
00390     egsInformation("Number of micros: %d %d %d\n",mx,my,mz);
00391     egsInformation("Number of micro-voxles: %d %d %d\n",nx,ny,nz);
00392 
00393     //
00394     // *** create an object for geometry computations
00395     //
00396     vg = new EGS_VoxelGeometry(nx,ny,nz,ddx,ddy,ddz);
00397 
00398     //
00399     // *** initialize the 64 boxes needed for sub-micro-voxel energy deposition
00400     //     if needed
00401     //
00402     if( !bm_boxes_initialized ) {
00403         bm_boxes_initialized = true;
00404         for(int ixm=0; ixm<2; ++ixm) {
00405             EGS_Float xmin = bsc_thickness*ixm;
00406             for(int ixp=0; ixp<2; ++ixp) {
00407                 EGS_Float xmax = ddx - bsc_thickness*ixp;
00408                 for(int iym=0; iym<2; ++iym) {
00409                     EGS_Float ymin = bsc_thickness*iym;
00410                     for(int iyp=0; iyp<2; ++iyp) {
00411                         EGS_Float ymax = ddy - bsc_thickness*iyp;
00412                         for(int izm=0; izm<2; ++izm) {
00413                             EGS_Float zmin = bsc_thickness*izm;
00414                             for(int izp=0; izp<2; ++izp) {
00415                                 EGS_Float zmax = ddz - bsc_thickness*izp;
00416                                 int ibox = ixm+2*ixp+4*iym+8*iyp+16*izm+32*izp;
00417                                 bm_boxes[ibox].xmin = xmin;
00418                                 bm_boxes[ibox].xmax = xmax;
00419                                 bm_boxes[ibox].ymin = ymin;
00420                                 bm_boxes[ibox].ymax = ymax;
00421                                 bm_boxes[ibox].zmin = zmin;
00422                                 bm_boxes[ibox].zmax = zmax;
00423                             }
00424                         }
00425                     }
00426                 }
00427             }
00428         }
00429     }
00430 
00431     //
00432     // *** process micro data. After this loop the mico-matrices will contain
00433     //     0  for TB voxels
00434     //     1  for BSC-only voxels (possible if BSC thickness > voxel size/2)
00435     //     2  for BM-only voxels (i.e., no TB neighbours)
00436     //    >2  index of VHPBox corresponding to the BSC layers found in the voxel
00437     //
00438     //     we also compute the TB, BM and BSC volumes
00439     //
00440     v_tb  = new EGS_Float [nmic];
00441     v_bm  = new EGS_Float [nmic];
00442     v_bsc = new EGS_Float [nmic];
00443     double tot_tb = 0, tot_bm = 0, tot_bsc = 0;
00444     for(j=0; j<nmic; ++j) {
00445         int iz = j/mxy; int iy = (j-iz*mxy)/mx; int ix = j-iz*mxy-iy*mx;
00446         int ixm = ix-1; if( ixm < 0 ) ixm = mx-1;
00447         int ixp = ix+1; if( ixp >= mx ) ixp = 0;
00448         int iym = iy-1; if( iym < 0 ) iym = my-1;
00449         int iyp = iy+1; if( iyp >= my ) iyp = 0;
00450         int izm = iz-1; if( izm < 0 ) izm = mz-1;
00451         int izp = iz+1; if( izp >= mz ) izp = 0;
00452         EGS_Float bsc_vol = 0, bm_vol = 0, tb_vol = 0;
00453         for(int jx=0; jx<nx; ++jx) {
00454             for(int jy=0; jy<ny; ++jy) {
00455                 for(int jz=0; jz<nz; ++jz) {
00456                     int ireg = jx + jy*nx + jz*nxy;
00457                     if( micros[j][ireg] ) {
00458                         int micxm = !(jx > 0 ? micros[j][ireg-1] :
00459                             micros[ixm+iy*mx+iz*mxy][nx-1+jy*nx+jz*nxy]);
00460                         int micxp = !(jx < nx-1 ? micros[j][ireg+1] :
00461                             micros[ixp+iy*mx+iz*mxy][jy*nx+jz*nxy]);
00462                         int micym = !(jy > 0 ? micros[j][ireg-nx] :
00463                             micros[ix+iym*mx+iz*mxy][jx+(ny-1)*nx+jz*nxy]);
00464                         int micyp = !(jy < ny-1 ? micros[j][ireg+nx] :
00465                             micros[ix+iyp*mx+iz*mxy][jx+jz*nxy]);
00466                         int miczm = !(jz > 0 ? micros[j][ireg-nxy] :
00467                             micros[ix+iy*mx+izm*mxy][jx+jy*nx+(nz-1)*nxy]);
00468                         int miczp = !(jz < nz-1 ? micros[j][ireg+nxy] :
00469                             micros[ix+iy*mx+izp*mxy][jx+jy*nx]);
00470                         if( (micxm && micxp && 2*bsc_thickness>ddx) ||
00471                             (micym && micyp && 2*bsc_thickness>ddy) ||
00472                             (miczm && miczp && 2*bsc_thickness>ddz) ) {
00473                             micros[j][ireg] = 1; // i.e. all BSC
00474                             bsc_vol += 1;
00475                         }
00476                         else {
00477                             int ibox=micxm+2*micxp+4*micym+8*micyp+
00478                                      16*miczm+32*miczp;
00479                             micros[j][ireg] = ibox + 2;
00480                             if( !ibox ) bm_vol += 1;
00481                             else {
00482                                 double v =
00483                                     (bm_boxes[ibox].xmax-bm_boxes[ibox].xmin)*
00484                                     (bm_boxes[ibox].ymax-bm_boxes[ibox].ymin)*
00485                                     (bm_boxes[ibox].zmax-bm_boxes[ibox].zmin);
00486                                 v /= (ddx*ddy*ddz);
00487                                 bm_vol += v; bsc_vol += 1 - v;
00488                             }
00489                         }
00490                     }
00491                     else tb_vol += 1;
00492                 }
00493             }
00494         }
00495         egsInformation("Micro-matrix %d from %s:\n",j+1,micro_file);
00496         egsInformation("  TB volume fraction: %g\n",tb_vol/nxyz);
00497         egsInformation("  BM volume fraction: %g\n",bm_vol/nxyz);
00498         egsInformation(" BSC volume fraction: %g\n",bsc_vol/nxyz);
00499         egsInformation("               Total: %g\n",(tb_vol+bm_vol+bsc_vol)/nxyz);
00500         v_tb[j] = tb_vol*ddx*ddy*ddz;
00501         v_bm[j] = bm_vol*ddx*ddy*ddz;
00502         v_bsc[j] = bsc_vol*ddx*ddy*ddz;
00503         tot_tb += tb_vol; tot_bm += bm_vol; tot_bsc += bsc_vol;
00504     }
00505     egsInformation("Average volume fractions:\n");
00506     egsInformation("  TB volume fraction: %g\n",tot_tb/(nmic*nxyz));
00507     egsInformation("  BM volume fraction: %g\n",tot_bm/(nmic*nxyz));
00508     egsInformation(" BSC volume fraction: %g\n",tot_bsc/(nmic*nxyz));
00509 }
00510 
00511 EGS_MicroMatrixCluster::~EGS_MicroMatrixCluster() {
00512 }
00513 #endif
00514 
00515 EGS_TestMicro::EGS_TestMicro(EGS_Float Dx, EGS_Float Dy, EGS_Float Dz,
00516         EGS_Float bsc_t,int tb_med, int bm_med,const char *micro_file,
00517         const string &Name) : EGS_BaseGeometry(Name) {
00518     micro = new EGS_MicroMatrixCluster(Dx,Dy,Dz,bsc_t,tb_med,bm_med,micro_file);
00519     vg = new EGS_VoxelGeometry(micro->mx,micro->my,micro->mz,Dx,Dy,Dz);
00520     nr = micro->nx*micro->ny*micro->nz;
00521     nreg = nr*micro->mx*micro->my*micro->mz;
00522 }

00524 void EGS_TestMicro::setMedia(EGS_Input *, int , const int *) {
00525     egsFatal("EGS_TestMicro::setMedia(EGS_Input*,int,const int *):\n"
00526             "  Don't use this method. Media are only set via the micro matrix"
00527             " data\n");
00528 }

00530 EGS_TestMicro::~EGS_TestMicro() {
00531 }
00532 
00533 string EGS_TestMicro::type = "EGS_TestMicro";
00534 
00535 const static EGS_VHP_LOCAL char *vhp_error_msg1 =
00536   "createGeometry(VHP): wrong/missing %s input for micro_test geometry\n";
00537 
00538 extern "C" {
00539 
00540 EGS_VHP_EXPORT EGS_BaseGeometry* createGeometry(EGS_Input *input) {
00541     string type;
00542     int err = input->getInput("type",type);
00543     if( !err && type == "micro_test" ) {
00544         bool ok = true;
00545         vector<EGS_Float> vs;
00546         err = input->getInput("voxel sizes",vs);
00547         if( err || vs.size() != 3 ) {
00548             egsWarning(vhp_error_msg1,"'voxel sizes'"); ok = false;
00549         }
00550         EGS_Float bsc_t;
00551         err = input->getInput("BSC thickness",bsc_t);
00552         if( err ) {
00553             egsWarning(vhp_error_msg1,"'BSC thickness'"); ok = false;
00554         }
00555         string tb_medium, bm_medium;
00556         int err1 = input->getInput("TB medium",tb_medium);
00557         int err2 = input->getInput("BM medium",bm_medium);
00558         if( err1 ) egsWarning(vhp_error_msg1,"'TB medium'");
00559         if( err2 ) egsWarning(vhp_error_msg1,"'BM medium'");
00560         if( err1 || err2 ) ok = false;
00561         string micro_data;
00562         err = input->getInput("micro data file",micro_data);
00563         if( err ) { egsWarning(vhp_error_msg1,"'micro data file'"); ok = false;}
00564         if( !ok ) return 0;
00565         int tb_med = EGS_BaseGeometry::addMedium(tb_medium);
00566         int bm_med = EGS_BaseGeometry::addMedium(bm_medium);
00567         EGS_TestMicro *result = new EGS_TestMicro(vs[0],vs[1],vs[2],bsc_t,
00568                 tb_med,bm_med,micro_data.c_str());
00569         result->setName(input);
00570         result->setLabels(input);
00571         return result;
00572     }
00573     string phantom, media;
00574     int err1 = input->getInput("phantom data",phantom);
00575     int err2 = input->getInput("media data",media);
00576     if( err1 ) egsWarning("createGeometry(EGS_VHPGeometry): "
00577             "missing 'phantom data' input\n");
00578     if( err2 ) egsWarning("createGeometry(EGS_VHPGeometry): "
00579             "missing 'media data' input\n");
00580     if( err1 || err2 ) return 0;
00581     vector<int> srange;
00582     err1 = input->getInput("slice range",srange);
00583     EGS_VHPGeometry *result;
00584     if( !err1 && srange.size() == 2 && srange[1] > srange[0] ) result =
00585         new EGS_VHPGeometry(phantom.c_str(),media.c_str(),srange[0],srange[1]);
00586     else result = new EGS_VHPGeometry(phantom.c_str(),media.c_str());
00587     if( !result->isOK() ) {
00588         egsWarning("createGeometry(EGS_VHPGeometry): failed to construct "
00589                 "geometry");
00590         delete result; return 0;
00591     }
00592     result->setName(input);
00593     result->setMicros(input);
00594     result->setLabels(input);
00595     return result;
00596 }
00597 
00598 }
